casebody.data:
TOWNSHIP OF PISCATAWAY, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
SOUTH WASHINGTON AVENUE, LLC; Ruth Halper, Executrix of the Estate of Herbert Halper; Mark Halper, Ruby Halper-Erkkila, M.D.; Faith Rost; Ronald Halper; Bonnie Halper ; and Cindy Halper-Raiman, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Laurence Halper, Defendant-Respondent. Township of Piscataway, Plaintiff,
v.
South Washington Avenue, LLC; Ruth Halper, Executrix of the Estate of Herbert Halper; Mark Halper, Ruby Halper-Erkkila, M.D.; Faith Rost; Ronald Halper; Bonnie Halper ; and Cindy Halper-Raiman, Defendants,
and
Laurence Halper, Defendant. C-999 September Term 2017
080659 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 12, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-1380/1781-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
